title: Charge polarization - neutral sphere and negtv rod

content.question: An electrically neutral metal sphere is on an insulating stand. A negatively charged rod is then brought close to the sphere without making contact. Which of the following correctly describes the resulting distribution of charge, if any, on the sphere?

choices.label: The sphere remains neutral, and is neutral everywhere.
The sphere remains neutral, but has both positive and negative regions.

content.answer: The sphere remains neutral, but has both positive and negative regions.
